abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is KOed with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 its max HP.

abilities.name: Air Lock
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks have 1.3x power if it is the last to move in a turn.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: If this Pokemon (not its substitute) takes a critical hit, its Attack is raised 12 stages.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon shudders if any foe has a supereffective or OHKO move.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are airborne.

abilities.name: Bad Dreams
abilities.description: Causes sleeping foes to lose 1/8 of their max HP at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Defense stat stage.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Fire attacks.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

abilities.name: Color Change
abilities.description: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of a move it's hit by, unless it has the type.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has a stat stage raised it is lowered instead, and vice versa.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: 30% chance of infatuating Pokemon of the opposite gender if they make contact.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents Explosion/Mind Blown/Self-Destruct/Aftermath while this Pokemon is active.

abilities.name: Defeatist
abilities.description: While this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its max HP, its Attack and Sp. Atk are halved.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.

abilities.name: Download
abilities.description: On switch-in, Attack or Sp. Atk is raised 1 stage based on the foes' weaker Defense.

abilities.name: Drizzle
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: This Pokemon is healed 1/4 by Water, 1/8 by Rain; is hurt 1.25x by Fire, 1/8 by Sun.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: 30% chance of poison/paralysis/sleep on others making contact with this Pokemon.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.description: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.

abilities.name: Flare Boost
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is burned, its special attacks have 1.5x power.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity.

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.description: If user is Cherrim and Sunny Day is active, it and allies' Attack and Sp. Def are 1.5x.

abilities.name: Forecast
abilities.description: Castform's type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the foes' move with the highest power.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: This Pokemon's allies receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held items of all opposing Pokemon.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokemon eats Berries at 1/2 max HP or less instead of their usual 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: If last item used is a Berry, 50% chance to restore it each end of turn. 100% in Sun.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.description: 30% chance this Pokemon's ally has its status cured at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.description: The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved; burn damage halved.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: This Pokemon's weight is doubled.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.description: No competitive use.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is 1.5x and accuracy of its physical attacks is 0.8x.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: This Pokemon has its status cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: If Hail is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn; immunity to Hail.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: No competitive use.

abilities.name: Illusion
abilities.description: This Pokemon appears as the last Pokemon in the party until it takes direct damage.

abilities.name: Immunity
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

abilities.name: Imposter
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Moves ignore substitutes and foe's Reflect/Light Screen/Safeguard/Mist/Aurora Veil.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opponents by 1 stage.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have 1.2x power. Sucker Punch is not boosted.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a Dark-type move.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokemon's accuracy can't be lowered by others; ignores their evasiveness stat.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: This Pokemon's held item has no effect, except Macho Brace. Fling cannot be used.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot be statused and Rest will fail for it.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground; Gravity/Ingrain/Smack Down/Iron Ball nullify it.

abilities.name: Light Metal
abilities.description: This Pokemon's weight is halved.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: This Pokemon draws Electric moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Electric immunity.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.description: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: This Pokemon blocks certain Status moves and bounces them back to the user.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks.

abilities.name: Magma Armor
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.

abilities.name: Magnet Pull
abilities.description: Prevents opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: If an active ally has this Ability or the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: Raises a random stat by 2 and lowers another stat by 1 at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by an Electric move; Electric immunity.

abilities.name: Mountaineer
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.

abilities.name: Multiscale
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.

abilities.name: Multitype
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate or Z-Crystal.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Mummy.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.

abilities.name: Normalize
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves are changed to be Normal type and have 1.2x power.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to powder moves, Sandstorm or Hail damage, Effect Spore.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Grass attacks.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be confused.

abilities.name: Persistent
abilities.description: When used, Gravity/Heal Block/Safeguard/Tailwind/Room effects last 2 more turns.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has no item and is hit by a contact move, it steals the attacker's item.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has no item, it finds one used by an adjacent Pokemon this turn.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.description: If an active ally has this Ability or the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

abilities.name: Poison Heal
abilities.description: This Pokemon is healed by 1/8 of its max HP each turn when poisoned; no HP loss.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: This Pokemon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Status moves have priority raised by 1, but Dark types are immune.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is the target of a foe's move, that move loses one additional PP.

abilities.name: Pure Power
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is statused, its Speed is 1.5x; ignores Speed drop from paralysis.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type attack.

abilities.name: Rebound
abilities.description: On switch-in, blocks certain status moves and bounces them back to the user.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have 1.2x power; not Struggle.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: This Pokemon restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it switches out.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks do 1.25x on same gender targets; 0.75x on opposite gender.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle/Life Orb/crash damage.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: No competitive use.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Ground/Rock/Steel attacks do 1.3x in Sandstorm; immunity to it.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled; immunity to Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised 1 stage if hit by a Grass move; Grass immunity.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: This Pokemon can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.description: Prevents foes from choosing to switch unless they also have this Ability.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have 1.3x power; nullifies the effects.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

abilities.name: Simple
abilities.description: When one of this Pokemon's stat stages is raised or lowered, the amount is doubled.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.description: This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times.

abilities.name: Slow Start
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Hail.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Hail.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x; loses 1/8 max HP per turn.

abilities.name: Solid Rock
abilities.description: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field.

abilities.name: Stall
abilities.description: This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.description: This Pokemon draws Water moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Water immunity.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. Immune to OHKO.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.description: This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Bug attacks.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have 1.5x power, including Struggle.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokemon does not take damage from attacks made by its allies.

abilities.name: Teravolt
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: Fire-/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved offensive stat.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Water attacks.

abilities.name: Toxic Boost
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is poisoned, its physical attacks have 1.5x power.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.description: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.description: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

abilities.name: Turboblaze
abilities.description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries.

abilities.name: Victory Star
abilities.description: This Pokemon and its allies' moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.1.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, Defense is lowered by 1, Speed is raised by 2.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

abilities.name: Wonder Guard
abilities.description: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.description: Status moves with accuracy checks are 50% accurate when used on this Pokemon.

abilities.name: Zen Mode
abilities.description: If Darmanitan, at end of turn changes Mode to Standard if > 1/2 max HP, else Zen.

abilities.name: Aerilate
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Flying type and have 1.2x power.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.description: Protects user/allies from Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, and Torment.

abilities.name: Aura Break
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, the Dark Aura and Fairy Aura power modifier is 0.75x.

abilities.name: Battery
abilities.description: This Pokemon's allies have the power of their special attacks multiplied by 1.3.

abilities.name: Battle Bond
abilities.description: After KOing a Pokemon: becomes Ash-Greninja, Water Shuriken: 20 power, hits 3x.

abilities.name: Beast Boost
abilities.description: This Pokemon's highest stat is raised by 1 if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 when it reaches 1/2 or less of its max HP.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: This Pokemon is immune to bullet moves.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.description: If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it restores 1/3 of its max HP after the Berry's effect.

abilities.name: Comatose

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.

abilities.name: Corrosion

abilities.name: Dancer
abilities.description: After another Pokemon uses a dance move, this Pokemon uses the same move.

abilities.name: Dark Aura
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, a Dark move used by any Pokemon has 1.33x power.

abilities.name: Dazzling
abilities.description: This Pokemon and its allies are protected from opposing priority moves.

abilities.name: Delta Stream
abilities.description: On switch-in, strong winds begin until this Ability is not active in battle.

abilities.name: Desolate Land

abilities.name: Disguise
abilities.description: (Mimikyu only) First hit deals 0 damage, breaks disguise.

abilities.name: Electric Surge
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Electric Terrain.

abilities.name: Emergency Exit
abilities.description: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Fairy Aura
abilities.description: While this Pokemon is active, a Fairy move used by any Pokemon has 1.33x power.

abilities.name: Flower Veil

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes 1/2 damage from contact moves, 2x damage from Fire moves.

abilities.description: This Pokemon's Defense is doubled.

abilities.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, its Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

abilities.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Electric type and have 1.2x power.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.

abilities.description: If Grassy Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

abilities.name: Grassy Surge
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Grassy Terrain.

abilities.name: Innards Out
abilities.description: If this Pokemon is KOed with a move, that move's user loses an equal amount of HP.

abilities.name: Liquid Voice
abilities.description: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Water type.

abilities.name: Long Reach
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.description: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon it hits with an attack.

abilities.name: Mega Launcher

abilities.name: Misty Surge

abilities.name: Neuroforce
abilities.description: This Pokemon's attacks that are super effective against the target do 1.25x damage.

abilities.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy type and have 1.2x power.

abilities.name: Power of Alchemy
abilities.description: This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints.

abilities.name: Primordial Sea
abilities.description: On switch-in, heavy rain begins until this Ability is not active in battle.

abilities.name: Prism Armor
abilities.description: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

abilities.name: Protean
abilities.description: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the move it is about to use.

abilities.name: Psychic Surge
abilities.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Psychic Terrain.

abilities.description: This Pokemon and its allies are protected from opposing priority moves.

abilities.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Ice type and have 1.2x power.

abilities.name: Shadow Shield

abilities.description: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

abilities.name: Soul-Heart
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Special Attack is raised by 1 stage when another Pokemon faints.

abilities.name: Stakeout
abilities.description: This Pokemon's offensive stat is doubled against a target that switched in this turn.

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.description: This Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a move.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.description: If Aegislash, changes Forme to Blade before attacks and Shield before King's Shield.

abilities.name: Steelworker
abilities.description: This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Steel-type attack.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have 1.5x power. Bug Bite is not boosted.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil

abilities.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.

abilities.description: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.
